data.name: YonDelver
data.detailed_description: The Delve: a massive sinkhole whose bottom could not be seen. This city-sized hole cracked open under an ocean draining it into a salted desert. Early humanity became infatuated, some worshipped the Delve, others tried to climb down, and many gazed for days looking for something in the abyss. However, all three of these groups were reported to mention the same thing: a small "pressure" feeling, they said they could feel it in their soul. They felt this every waking hour for the rest of their lives, not knowing what caused it. Tens of decades later civilization has gained the technology to explore the world. Corporations fighting to be in the front of this new expanding horizon find themselves being the only entities willing to attempt to travel down the Delve. This particular Delve is the battleground for an untold war between DelvAge and the financial giant known as CTR. In a heated decision the philanthropist who runs Delvage known as "Duke Hand" initiated a worldwide challenge issued to anyone willing to find the treasures deep into the Delve. This war was no longer a secret. And as a storm of new people floods into the war against CTR, You are precisely the person he is looking for.
data.about_the_game: The Delve: a massive sinkhole whose bottom could not be seen. This city-sized hole cracked open under an ocean draining it into a salted desert. Early humanity became infatuated, some worshipped the Delve, others tried to climb down, and many gazed for days looking for something in the abyss. They felt this every waking hour for the rest of their lives, not knowing what caused it. Tens of decades later civilization has gained the technology to explore the world. Corporations fighting to be in the front of this new expanding horizon find themselves being the only entities willing to attempt to travel down the Delve. data.short_description: YonDelver is a roguelike bullet-hell hack n' slash. With no stone left unturned on the surface, corporations fight over the rights to massive sinkholes known as "Delves". Team up with players and build up an arsenal before taking on the terrors that sleep deep under the clouds within the delve.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080+
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything onboard
  • Additional Notes: No idea how accurate this is
